nextJobs.name: Downtime gap auto-fill guard (quiet unless triggered)
Control room issue triage + QA intake

findings: Added cron guard `Model capacity guard (auto model switch)` (`1c6ec880-aca2-4983-a97c-dfbed6c0e335`) on `12,42 * * * *` to monitor session usage and auto-switch non-critical jobs between codex/codex-spark based on headroom thresholds.
Captured directive in `MEMORY.md`: continuously monitor model capacity and proactively switch non-critical jobs to preserve critical reliability.
Sean preference update: avoid proactive pings for non-feature maintenance/small tweaks; only send proactive updates for major hardening/capability shifts, blockers, or materially impactful outcomes.
Built `scripts/validate_today_status_freshness.py` to catch stale `TODAY_STATUS.md` by verifying today's local date token appears.
Added `scripts/test_validate_today_status_freshness.py` (3 unit tests, passing) and captured proof in `status/capability-surprise-2026-02-19-1610.md`.
Operationalized check in `status/ops_hygiene_checks.md` for recurring autonomous sweeps.

20:20 — Scheduled job: Reliability watchdog hourly (self-heal + conditional alert)

jobSuccessTrend.job: Control room issue triage + QA intake
Downtime gap auto-fill guard (quiet unless triggered)

activity.text: Implemented interactive Skills actions in `claw-control-room`: locked-skill `Start Learning`, `Discover New Skill` candidate flow, and live node/modal job states (`pending/running/completed`).
Added deterministic skill progression updates on learning-job completion (tier/level/progress/unlock transitions).
Added Playwright regression `scripts/tests/test_skill_actions_flow.mjs` and wired into `scripts/quality_gate.sh`; full quality gate passed.
Saved proof notes: `status/overnight/skill-actions-proof.md`.
Added MCP scaffold transport/helpers under `claw-control-room/scripts/mcp/` and implemented Control-Room server actions for issue/status/release/runtime.
Added Skill-Lab MCP scaffold server with discover/learn/level-transition flows and JSON-backed scaffold state.
Drafted Runtime-Bridge low-latency sync protocol in `claw-control-room/docs/mcp/runtime-bridge-protocol-draft.md`.

Implemented and validated an end-to-end MCP-connected flow (`run_control_room_mcp_flow.py` + `test_control_room_mcp_flow.py`), with proof artifact at `status/overnight/mcp-control-room-flow-proof.json`.
Wrote overnight deliverables: `status/overnight/mcp-pack.md` and related plan/draft files; full quality gate passed.

Reviewed `ClawPrime_Memory.md` plus latest high-signal outcomes from `memory/2026-02-17.md`, `memory/2026-02-18.md`, `memory/2026-02-19.md`, and overnight status logs (`status/overnight/mcp-pack.md`, `status/overnight/skill-actions-proof.md`, `status/overnight-control-room-log.md`).
Distilled and refreshed durable memory with 3 reinforced patterns: layered runtime-truth guardrails, explicit degraded/source trust semantics, and deterministic+proofed feature shipping.
Pruned redundancy and tightened default friction-fix sequence to include screenshot proof + gate-before-release discipline.

Auto-applied workflow improvement: upgraded `scripts/clawprime_memory_evolution_helper.py` with CLI options and overnight-artifact ingestion, then generated `status/clawprime-memory-digest.md` for faster daily evolution cycles.
Sean reported a non-operational incident tied to codex-spark exhaustion/cooldown behavior and requested proactive model switching before limits get tight.

Repointed key spark-based automation jobs to `openai-codex/gpt-5.3-codex` (failover guard, status publish, dashboard refresh, triage, validator, lint, stale-prune) to avoid pinning operations to spark.

Added cron guard `Model capacity guard (auto model switch)` (`1c6ec880-aca2-4983-a97c-dfbed6c0e335`) on `12,42 * * * *` to monitor session usage and auto-switch non-critical jobs between codex/codex-spark based on headroom thresholds.
Captured directive in `MEMORY.md`: continuously monitor model capacity and proactively switch non-critical jobs to preserve critical reliability.
Sean preference update: avoid proactive pings for non-feature maintenance/small tweaks; only send proactive updates for major hardening/capability shifts, blockers, or materially impactful outcomes.
Built `scripts/validate_today_status_freshness.py` to catch stale `TODAY_STATUS.md` by verifying today's local date token appears.
Added `scripts/test_validate_today_status_freshness.py` (3 unit tests, passing) and captured proof in `status/capability-surprise-2026-02-19-1610.md`.
Operationalized check in `status/ops_hygiene_checks.md` for recurring autonomous sweeps.

nodes.name: Runtime Orchestration
nodes.description: Coordinate cron and subagent execution lanes into one deterministic runtime view.
nodes.effect: Keeps now/next/done and runtime surfaces synchronized.

tierLadder.title: Foundation
tierLadder.definition: Establish baseline terminology and starter workflows for Runtime Orchestration.
tierLadder.difference: Unlocks dependable baseline execution in this domain.

tierLadder.title: Guided Delivery
tierLadder.definition: Deliver scoped improvements for Runtime Orchestration with QA-guided feedback loops.
tierLadder.difference: Moves from familiarity to repeatable hands-on delivery.

tierLadder.title: Independent Reliability
tierLadder.definition: Run Runtime Orchestration workflows end-to-end with consistent reliability.
tierLadder.difference: Shifts from guided execution into autonomous ownership.

tierLadder.title: Strategic Optimization
tierLadder.definition: Instrument and optimize Runtime Orchestration systems proactively.
tierLadder.difference: Elevates delivery into durable system-level optimization.

tierLadder.title: System Stewardship
tierLadder.definition: Set standards and evolve long-term capability across Runtime Orchestration.
tierLadder.difference: Represents expert-level stewardship and long-range leverage.
